articles.author: News18
articles.title: Major Security Alert for Android Users - News18
articles.description:
CERT-In has warned millions of Android smartphone
users in India about a major security risk that puts Android
versions 10 to 13 in a vulnerable position.
articles.content: Producer:  Priyanka DasEditor: Sujata Singh
